message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

I understand that $110 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $125. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $125. I'd be willing to pay $115 for the product. Can you consider that?
